useCase.name: Deployment of a New Dataset Type Version

mainSequence.step: Deployment Module checks for existing versions
Version Control retrieves current versions of dataset type
Dataset Management provides a list of current versions
Version Control confirms the existence of existing versions
Deployment Module creates a new version
Version Control registers the new dataset type version
Dataset Management successfully registers the new version
Version Control informs Deployment Module about the new version creation
Deployment Module includes the new dataset type in app artifact
App Artifact Repository updates the app artifact
Deployment Module confirms successful deployment to AppDeveloper
